feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.6
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-in-202486

What's Changed

  • providers/proxy: fix redirect_uri (cherry-pick #12121) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12126
  • providers/oauth2: fix redirect uri input (cherry-pick #12122) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12128
  • web: bump API Client version (cherry-pick #12129) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12131
  • providers/oauth2: fix migration (cherry-pick #12138) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.5...version/2024.8.6

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.10.5
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.10#fixed-in-2024105

What's Changed

  • root: fix database ssl options not set correctly (cherry-pick #12180) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12183
  • web: backport fix impersonate api by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12184
  • web/flows: resize captcha iframes (cherry-pick #12260) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12304
  • stages/identification: fix invalid challenge warning when no captcha stage is set (cherry-pick #12312) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12314
  • enterprise/stages/authenticator_endpoint_gdtc: don't set frame options globally (cherry-pick #12311) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12315
  • flows: better test stage's challenge responses (cherry-pick #12316) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12317

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.10.4...version/2024.10.5

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12

What's Changed

  • translate: Updates for file web/xliff/en.xlf in zh-Hans (cherry-pick #12401) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12410
  • translate: Updates for file locale/en/LC_MESSAGES/django.po in zh-Hans (cherry-pick #12400) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12409
  • translate: Updates for file locale/en/LC_MESSAGES/django.po in zh_CN (cherry-pick #12399) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12408
  • translate: Updates for file web/xliff/en.xlf in zh_CN (cherry-pick #12402) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12411
  • events: notification_cleanup: avoid unnecessary loop (cherry-pick #12417) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12418
  • root: expose CONN_MAX_AGE, CONN_HEALTH_CHECKS and DISABLE_SERVER_SIDE_CURSORS for PostgreSQL config (cherry-pick #10159) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12419
  • website/docs: prepare for 2024.12.0 (cherry-pick #12420) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.0-rc1...version/2024.12.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024121

What's Changed

  • website/docs: add new section about impersonation (cherry-pick #12328) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12424
  • website/docs: add content about bindings (cherry-pick #11787) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12428
  • internal: fix URL generation for websocket connection (cherry-pick #12439) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12440

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.0...version/2024.12.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024122

What's Changed

  • internal: fix missing trailing slash in outpost websocket (cherry-pick #12470) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12471
  • sources/kerberos: authenticate with the user's username instead of the first username in authentik (cherry-pick #12497) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12579
  • rbac: permissions endpoint: allow authenticated users (cherry-pick #12608) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12610
  • core: fix error when creating new user with default path (cherry-pick #12609) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12612
  • providers/saml: fix invalid SAML Response when assertion and response are signed (cherry-pick #12611) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12613

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.1...version/2024.12.2
